UPDATE light_scene_timing
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
attribute_id = #{attributeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time},
skip_holiday_flag = #{skipHolidayFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
switch_flag = #{switchFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ct = #{ct},
ut = #{ut},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.switch_flag, t.skip_holiday_flag, t.time, a.NAME, a.code FROM light_scene_timing t INNER JOIN t_light_attribute a ON a.id = t.attribute_id WHERE t.device_id = #{deviceId}

SELECT t.id, t.skip_holiday_flag, d.adress, a.CODE, ad.floor FROM light_scene_timing t INNER JOIN t_light_device d ON d.id = t.attribute_id INNER JOIN t_light_attribute a ON a.id = t.attribute_id inner join t_light_area_device ad on ad.device_id = d.id WHERE t.switch_flag = 1 AND t.time = #{time}

SELECT a.id as value, a.NAME as label FROM t_light_device d INNER JOIN t_light_product p ON d.product_id = p.id INNER JOIN t_light_type_attribute ta ON ta.type_id = p.type_id INNER JOIN t_light_attribute a ON ta.attribute_id = a.id WHERE d.id = #{deviceId}
